title: How Do I Upgrade My Phone's Software?
answer:
After an upgrade, all user data such as contact information, text messages, and multimedia messages on
your phone will be erased. Therefore, back up important data before upgrading your phone's software.
    To upgrade online, touch > Settings > About phone, and select Online upgrade.
    To upgrade using a microSD card, download the upgrade package from a Huawei server to
the microSD card, and then touch > Settings > Storage > Software Upgrade > SD
card Upgrade
